plot: Luca Changretta understands the complexity of his enemy, as the weight of gypsy tradition hangs upon Arthur. But could there be a traitor within the Peaky Blinders' midst?

Tommy brings in blackleg workers to break the strike before calling a family business meeting and planning how to beat Changretta's gang, two of whom corner Arthur, who disposes of them. Suspecting Jessie may have inadvertently led them to the factory Tommy visits her and she reminds him of his former lover Greta, who died young. Tommy relives her memory with Lizzie, whom he puts in charge of running two charities n Greta's name. Meanwhile Aunt Polly goes to meet an old acquaintance.—don @ minifie-1
